title: Far Cry 2 (*.ISO image) with crack
description:
Far Cry 2 disc image (*.ISO) with "No disc or activation required" crack.

This has been successfully tested on about 4 machines so far, works a charm! This is a compilation of a disc image created by myself (using Brasero in Linux) and a fully working crack found on the net along with instructions on installing everything.

Files in this package:

FARCRY2.ISO:
This is the disc image of the original game disc. Use a programme like InfraRecorder (free) / Nero Burning Rom to burn the image to disc or use a programme like PowerISO or Daemon Tools to mount the image within Windows.

FarCry2.exe:
This is the cracked executable game file which makes the game usable without having to have the disc in the drive and negates the need to enter or activate a product key. When you install the game you will replace the orginal "FarCry2.exe" with this one.

FarCry2-ISO-and-crack.txt
This is an easy step by step guide to installing and replacing the original game files with the cracked ones. Open it in Notepad. If you&#039;re having problems drop a mail to the address included in this file.
